definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: It is available for optional multi-turn functionality.
sentences.chinese: 这种执行器提供了可选择的多回转功能。

sentences.english: T2 rotary awl cover is a kind of structural member that has been applied extensively.
sentences.chinese: T2铜材回转锥型罩是一种被广泛应用的结构件。

sentences.english: Cimmaron . This ski run has a giant slalom feel to it with good reason.
sentences.chinese: 这个滑雪场运行有大回转的感觉是很有道理的。

sentences.english: Symbol for simulations of gyrator is built by SPICE languages.
sentences.chinese: 建立了用SPICE语言描述的回转器仿真模型。

sentences.english: The beam motion is divided into two parts: rigid rotation and flexible vibration.
sentences.chinese: 假设梁的运动由刚性回转与柔性振动两部分组成。

sentences.english: The slewing mechanism consists of hydraulic motor and worm speed reducer.
sentences.chinese: 回转机构由液压马达及蜗轮蜗杆减速器组成。

sentences.english: Further, the end of the bristle curving portion is fixed on the brush substrate.
sentences.chinese: 进一步，所述刷毛回转部分端头固定于刷板。

sentences.english: Double lower shapes, 180 degrees turning, lower shape rise to press, and with high efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 双下模，180度回转，下模上顶加压，工作效率高。

sentences.english: According to the operation and check for one and half years, such gyroscopic support is good in performance.
sentences.chinese: 改造后经一年半的运行检验，回转支承性能良好。

sentences.english: This quality can be use successfully in the entire zone of cement rotary kilns.
sentences.chinese: 该产品可成功地运用于水泥回转窑的整个碱性区域。

sentences.english: The main grating fix up in the gyre axis.
sentences.chinese: 主轴线回转的光栅修理起来。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the thermal performance of high pressure rotary seals.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了对高压回转密封件的热性能研究。

sentences.english: The ejection - port cover rolled shut and there was a feeling like being shot from a cannon .
sentences.chinese: 弹射口盖板回转关闭，之后就有种炮弹出膛的感觉。

sentences.english: MANEUVERABILITY. Unique design with 3-wheel turning radius.
sentences.chinese: 轮回转半径的独特设计。

sentences.english: Loosens rotates boom's stopping nut, promotes the hopper changes to the next working procedure.
sentences.chinese: 松开回转叉架的锁紧螺母，将料斗推出转到下一工序。

sentences.english: Mr Bush's first U-turn was on Iran.
sentences.chinese: 布什先生的第一个回转在伊朗。

definition: to return/to go back/to come back
to turn/to turn around/to transfer (funds etc)
to reassign sb to a different job/to turn around/to change direction/to make a U turn
to make an about-turn/to reverse one's direction, policy, sequence etc/to turn things on their head
to turn back/to put back/reversal/melodic inversion (in music)
to turn back/to retrace one's steps
to go on a journey/to leave
to draw to oneself/to gather up/to collect/to fold up (an umbrella, wings etc)/to assemble (a party of persons)/to rope in (some people)
to come to a stand/to stop
to spin rapidly/to whirl around/(of time) to fly by
